acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleIntegerValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.IntegerValuePojo

Then the Pojo IntegerRangeValuesPojo ( intFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 intFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 intFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 51 intFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 602 integerObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 integerObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 50 integerObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 894 integerObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 ) should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field 51 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field 602 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 50 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 894 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
